description:
#### New package name: **[grammarly-for-windows](https://community.chocolatey.org/packages/grammarly-for-windows)**

---

`grammarly` has been deprecated because the software version has been rebranded. 

It exists only for backward compatibility to provide a transitional dummy package for existing users and scripts which may still use this package ID.
summary: Grammarly is the world’s leading automated proofreader. It checks for more than 250 types of spelling, grammar, and punctuation errors, enhances vocabulary usage, and suggests citations.
author: Grammarly Inc.
